title: sejky
author: sejky
content: Hi,the motherboard for my Antminer Z15 420 Ksol/s has gone. Where is the best place to buy it so I don't fall for scammers?thanks

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: You can check with ZeusBTC but they often have minimum orders of X units, they rarely accept orders for 1 unit but we never know, it cost nothing to ask them.Otherwise on Ebay, you have buyer protection and you can be generally safe by choosing your seller correctly.Or you can always post an ad here on the forum and go through a reputable escrow.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: What do you mean by gone is it broken or do you mean the control board is gone and only the hashboard is left?ZeusBTC is a legit site as suggested above but if you are looking for safety then why not buy directly on Bitmain?It seems they do have stocks of control boards for this unit check the link below.- https://m.bitmain.com/product/00020221202095834623fg4514yS065A

comments.author: ZeusBtc.com
comments.body: I'm sorry for being late. ZEUS MINING sells Antminer Z15, hash boards, control boards, and replacement accessories. If you need anything, feel free to visit our website and get in touch. Z15 Control Board is on sale at discount.Antminer Z15 control board C52 Xilinx 7007 | Zeus Mining
